pages.text: $(item)Calcite$() and $(item)Basalt$() keep the energies of the gems in check as long as they completely enclose the geode, that much is certain. Sometimes, however, the energy accumulated over centuries is so strong that it tears a hole in the geode.$(br2)You recreated the whole thing in miniature.$()

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Come in all gemstone colors. The frame can be built out of $(l:decoration/block_variants#polished_basalt)Polished Basalt$() or $(l:decoration/block_variants#polishing)Polished Calcite$().

pages.title: Alternative Recipe
pages.text: If you manage to obtain complete gemstone clusters, the runes are much more efficient to create.
